about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Newfound Courage and Winter's Fair, by award-winning composer Jessica Kelly featuring all 17 of the game and DLC's much loved musical compositions including Just Like me and Home.

Full tracklist:

  • Home
  • Some Other
  • The Vault
  • Sendings Eat Flowers
  • Legal Drinking Age
  • Dread
  • Lament
  • Waking up in Silverpine
  • This Elation
  • A Dead World
  • Closure
  • The Worst Memory
  • Resolutions
  • Hope
  • Just Like Me
  • Winter's Fair
  • Missed Connections

Songs will be downloaded to The Music of Newfound Courage folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Newfound Courage\The Music of Newfound Courage
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of Newfound Courage and Winter's Fair, by award-winning composer Jessica Kelly featuring all 17 of the game and DLC's much loved musical compositions including Just Like me and Home.

Full tracklist:

  • Home
  • Some Other
  • The Vault
  • Sendings Eat Flowers
  • Legal Drinking Age
  • Dread
  • Lament
  • Waking up in Silverpine
  • This Elation
  • A Dead World
  • Closure
  • The Worst Memory
  • Resolutions
  • Hope
  • Just Like Me
  • Winter's Fair
  • Missed Connections

Songs will be downloaded to The Music of Newfound Courage folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Newfound Courage\The Music of Newfound Courage
legal_notice: Copyright © 2018 Curtis Campion. All rights resereved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: So long as your computer can play an MP3 file, you'll be fine.

name: Newfound Courage - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: So long as your computer can play an MP3 file, you'll be fine.

short_description: The original soundtrack of Newfound Courage by Jessica Kelly.
